Detailed Description

Support library for the Zone Allocator.

Allocate a buffer from a memory zone.

Parameters:

pointer to buffer or NULL on failure
cvmx_zone_t cvmx_zone_create_from_addr ( char *  name,
uint32_t  elem_size,
uint32_t  num_elem,
void *  mem_ptr,
uint64_t  mem_size,
uint32_t  flags 
)

Creates a memory zone for efficient allocation/deallocation of fixed size memory blocks from a specified memory region.

Parameters:
name name of zone.
elem_size size of blocks that will be requested from zone
num_elem number of elements to allocate
mem_ptr pointer to memory to allocate zone from
mem_size size of memory region available (must be at least elem_size * num_elem + CVMX_ZONE_OVERHEAD bytes)
flags flags for zone. Currently unused.
Returns:
pointer to zone on success or NULL on failure
cvmx_zone_t cvmx_zone_create_from_arena ( char *  name,
uint32_t  elem_size,
uint32_t  num_elem,
uint32_t  align,
cvmx_arena_list_t  arena_list,
uint32_t  flags 
)

Creates a memory zone for efficient allocation/deallocation of fixed size memory blocks from a previously initialized arena list.

Parameters:
name name of zone.
elem_size size of blocks that will be requested from zone
num_elem number of elements to allocate
align alignment of buffers (must be power of 2) Elements are allocated contiguously, so the buffer size must be a multiple of the requested alignment for all buffers to have the requested alignment.
arena_list arena list to allocate memory from
flags flags for zone. Currently unused.
Returns:
pointer to zone on success or NULL on failure
void cvmx_zone_free ( cvmx_zone_t  zone,
void *  ptr 
)

Free a previously allocated buffer.

Parameters:
zone zone that buffer was allocated from
ptr pointer to buffer to be freed
